items.question: How long does it take to create a website?
items.answer: The average delivery time is 1 to 4 business days for simple websites. Projects with more pages or specific features may take a bit longer. Our biggest strength is combining speed with quality: we deliver fast without sacrificing a professional standard.

items.question: How much does a website cost?
items.answer: Prices start at R$250 and vary depending on the number of pages and complexity. Our goal is to keep prices accessible while delivering high-quality visuals and performance. Note: the domain (e.g., yoursite.com.br) is purchased separately, but we assist you throughout the process.

items.question: Are the websites mobile-friendly?
items.answer: Yes! All of our websites are fully responsive, ensuring a smooth experience across desktops, tablets, and smartphones. We test on various devices and browsers to ensure the best user experience.

items.question: Do you offer any warranty?
items.answer: We offer a 3-month warranty for bug fixes and technical adjustments after delivery. During this time, maintenance is free of charge. We also provide technical support and monthly maintenance plans for ongoing updates and improvements.

items.question: Do you provide hosting?
items.answer: Yes, we offer optimized hosting for the websites we build. We work with reliable, fast servers, including SSL, automatic backups, and 24/7 monitoring. If you prefer, we can also configure your site on a hosting provider of your choice.

items.question: Can I make changes to the website after it's completed?
items.answer: Of course! Websites with CMS allow you to update text, images, and basic content yourself. For more complex changes to design or functionality, we offer maintenance and update services. We also provide training to use the admin panel.

items.question: Do you create the website content?
items.answer: We can help with content creation! We offer copywriting, image selection, SEO optimization, and content structuring. If you already have the content, we can work with your material and adapt it as needed.

items.question: Will my website be SEO optimized?
items.answer: Yes! We follow SEO best practices for every site: clean URLs, optimized meta tags, semantic structure, fast loading, and mobile compatibility. We also offer content SEO consulting as an additional service.
